description: Try our easy to follow Gluten-Free Cauliflower Mac 'N' Cheese recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Mac & cheese,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,High fibre,Wheat free,Cauliflower,Peanut free
name: GlutenFree Cauliflower Mac 'N' Cheese Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large saucepan of water to the boil over high heat. Add glutenfree pasta and cauliflower florets and cook for 10 minutes or until tender. Drain and set aside.

Meanwhile, melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Add glutenfree flour and cook, stirring constantly, for 1 minute or until bubbling. Gradually whisk in milk, then bring to a simmer and cook, whisking constantly, for 2 minutes or until slightly thickened. Add cheeses, whisking until melted and smooth.

To make the cauliflower crumb topping, place cauliflower florets in a food processor and process until fine crumbs form. Add glutenfree breadcrumbs and parmesan. Season, then process until well combined.
Place sauce and pasta mixture in an ovenproof dish, mixing to combine. Top with cauliflower crumb mixture, then bake for 15 minutes or until topping is golden. Serve sprinkled with parsley.
